name: Dash
description: You have heard rumours of being able to move light on your feet, perhaps you can try it yourself?
message: As you attempt to move quickly, you feel your feet become tangled and you trip loudly

name: Donkey Roll
description: You throw away any pride you have and dive across the ground
message: You shift your weight and inelegantly yet gracefully roll across the ground

name: Wind Following Steps
description: You channel energy into your feet and legs, making your movements flow with the wind
message: Your movements become smooth and natural
